mapper.insert: insert into comment(content, user_id, article_id, created_time) values (#{content}, #{user.id}, #{articleId}, #{createdTime})
mapper.select: select comment.id, comment.content, comment.created_time, comment.article_id, user.id as user_id, user.username from comment, user where comment.user_id = user.id and comment.article_id = #{articleId} order by comment.created_time desc
